text: ondu vele allahanu manusyarannu avara krtyagaligagi (taksanave) siksisuvudagiddare, avanu idara (bhumiya) mele obba jiviyannu ulisuttiralilla. Nijavagi avanu avarige ondu nigadita samayada tanaka kalavakasa niduttane. Konege a nigadita samayavu bandu bittaga (sikse arambhavaguttade). Allahanu khandita tanna dasarannu noduttiruttane
